name: Misadventure
description:
Started at a local game jam and slowly being updated by me, like the rest of my projects ;) 

A love letter to the old Atari 2600 game Adventure with, hopefully, some eventual deviations from the original. 

The game is by no means complete, mostly you can just walk around the map. I still need to:

Finish some of the map areas

Add more items

Add dragons / bat

Improve the menu

Note also this is what would probably be considered the 'normal difficulty' considering the way the original 2600 game would let you adjust settings.
